creditline: Gift of James C. and Kathryn L. Hogan
description: man seated on a rock in LLC; man has a long beard and long, scraggly hair, holds a cane in his PR hand and wears a tunic with a patch on the PL hip, tights, boots and a tall hat; small sack on ground next to man; landscape with small bluff behind man, with trees at top
provenance: The artist; his stepson, Jim Hogan, Hudson, WI.
title: Untitled [figure with cane and small sack in landscape]
